entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
